# Dennis (Shaoxiong) Zheng 

### M.S. in Statistics Student at UChicago

[CV](https://dennissxz.github.io/pdfs/CV_DennisZheng.pdf) &nbsp;&nbsp;  denniszheng@uchicago.edu 


<p style="text-align:justify">

Hi! My name is Shaoxiong Zheng (郑少雄) and I go by Dennis. I am now a master student in Statistics at UChicago. Prior to that, I studied Statistics and Finance with First Class Honors from the University of Hong Kong. I am curious how statistical methods can help human beings make decisions in this world of uncertainty, and I have co-authored a book to share my thinking. In particular, my interest focuses on developing machine learning algorithms for graph-structured data, with applications in social networks, recommender systems, and other domains.
